title: groups.yml哪里设置错了，为什么连基本命令都用不了？
author: miaode
txt_content:
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'
groups:
    Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.chat.shout
    - essentials.compass
    - essentials.help
    - essentials.helpop
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.list
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.portal
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.signs.buy.use
    - essentials.signs.disposal.create
    - essentials.signs.disposal.use
    - essentials.signs.free.use
    - essentials.signs.heal.use
    - essentials.signs.mail.create
    - essentials.signs.mail.use
    - essentials.signs.protection.create
    - essentials.signs.protection.use
    - essentials.signs.sell.use
    - essentials.signs.trade.create
    - essentials.signs.trade.use
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - essentials.worth
    - essentials.pvp
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&e[冒险者]&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
groups:
 Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.* 
    - '*' 
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&1[技术顾问]&1' 
      build: true 
      suffix: ''         
  
groups:
 Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.* 
    - '*' 
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&2[蛋疼腐竹]&2' 
      build: true 
      suffix: ''

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 多出那么多groups:是什么情况

replies.author: miaode
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2013-3-31 12:24 
多出那么多groups:是什么情况
是我按照原来的用户组复制过来创建的用户组。。。

话说，你这个顾问的权限要跟腐竹一样？
